metadata.title: Landing Page with Store Location Map

story.iWant: to see the store's location on a map on the landing page
story.soThat: I can easily find the physical store

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: The landing page includes an embedded Google Maps view (FR017).
The map is centered on the Alta Sigar & Grill store location.
A pin or marker clearly indicates the store's address.

doc.title: Product Requirements Document
doc.snippet: FR017: The system shall integrate a Google Maps view on the landing page displaying the store's location.

doc.title: Epic 1 Technical Specification
doc.snippet: Question: What is the exact physical address to be used for the pin on the Google Maps view (FR017)?

file.reason: The map will be embedded into this existing component.

constraints.constraint: The map should be implemented using a simple `` embed from Google Maps.

story-context.interfaces: <interface name="Google Maps Embed" kind="iframe" signature="" reason="The method for displaying the map."/>

tests.standards: A simple E2E test should confirm the presence of the map element.

ideas.idea: Write an E2E test that loads the landing page and asserts that an `iframe` element with a `src` attribute containing 'google.com/maps' is present and visible.
